data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

data.partBlankContent: Have you read all of the book? Do y__ know every_____ there i_ to kn__ about Europe? Try th__ quiz t_ see h__ much y__ have lea___. Read t__ answers a__ click o_ the ans___ which y__ think i_ correct. Good luck!
data.fullContent: Have you read all of the book? Do you know everything there is to know about Europe? Try this quiz to see how much you have learnt. Read the answers and click on the answer which you think is correct. Good luck!
data.answer: 这本书你读完了吗?关于欧洲，你知道所有该知道的事吗?试试这个测验，看看你学到了多少。阅读所有选项，点击你认为正确的答案。祝好运！
